name: ThrowBack (ThatANonoWord)
description:
Are you tired of always having a weapon to shoot your enemies with?

...Wait, you are?

Anyways, play a game where your only method of combat is catching and throwing weapons at your opponent.

Play through 12 stages of running around and throwing your enemy's weapons back at them!

Other than WASD for moving, use left mouse button to grab and throw any weapon that you are holding. Hold down the left mouse button to throw with more force.

There is no music or sound yet, but that may change in the future.

Enjoy.
